name: TIME HUNTERS: ミクイ黄金像の呪い
name_original: TIME HUNTERS: ミクイ黄金像の呪い
description:
ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー

This game was made by new-hires to Byking Inc. during an introductory training period.
We ask for your understanding, for issues arising from certain operating environments,
or for any flaws or inadequacies present in the final product.
This game was made for local play,
but supports online via Steam Remote Play Together.

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー

*This title cannot be played using a keyboard or mouse*
*Four controllers are required to play, and this title is for local play only*

Are you ready?! Make some noise (and some enemies) in this action-packed party shooter for 4!
Utilize your unique energy shots, power-up your attacks with an array of pick-ups, and get set to take down the competition!!

4 players enter the arena…but the Curse of the Golden Idol demands that only 1 may leave. …will it be you?


🔷A 4-Way Battle Royale Shooter Extravaganza!🔷

You get a gun, they get a gun. Everybody gets a gun!
Shoot your way to victory and be the last Hunter standing!

🔷Watch Your Back Out There!🔷

Who to aim for and when to do it, careful consideration of your and your enemies’
resources could nab you victory…or see you lose it all!
Can you make the right decisions under pressure? Only time will tell…


🔷The Golden Idol’s Curse!
🔷ime Hunters are equipped with special guns…and special bullets. Bounce shots off walls to catch your foes off-guard!

And oh, what’s this? The Golden Idol demands a good fight! Pick up glowing,
Golden Idols scattered round the arena, and augment your shots with various buffs for maximum mayhem!

＞BOMB Shot＜

Penetrates walls and SHIELDs. Use it for explosive results!

＞BIG Shot＜

Size matters. Fire away and leave them with nowhere to run!

＞3-WAY Shot＜

A 3-WAY spreadshot. Never let them know your next move!

＞BOUNCE Shot＜

More BOUNCE, more mileage. Ricochets 3 times for off-the-wall fun!

＞SHIELD＜

Protect yourself from devastation...once! (Look out for BOMBs though!)

🔷Two Buffs are Better than One!!🔷

Does the power of the Golden Idol know no bounds!? (2, the bounds is 2)
Grab 2 different buffs, and reap the benefits of both at once. One Hunter’s meat is another Hunter’s
3-WAY explosive BOMB Shot to the face, so pick your poison and start a-blastin’!



The fabled BIG + BOMB Shot!


The legendary 3-WAY + BOMB Shot!

🔷A Smart Hunter’s a Happy Hunter!🔷

Whoa okay trigger-happy, hold on. Shooting up the place will only get you so far!
Keep track of your dash and remaining buff counts, and those of rival Hunters, for the greatest chance at success!

Got all that? Alright. Now go catch ‘em with their pants down, and have a good Time Hunting!
